bibl.title: Notes on Coptic Containers of Liquids in Greek Papyri
bibl.note: I. Jar names starting with the letters λακ- or λαγ-. - II. Collection of other Semitic terms for containers of liquids occurring in Greek papyri from Egypt: βανωτός / βανώτιον, βαύκαλις and βαυκάλιον, βῖκος and βικίον, ἵνιον, κάβος / καβίδιον, κόεις, κόντσου, σιρώτ(ης) / σιρωτόν / συρωτόν, τιλμεει, χαλμαια, ψινθ( ).

bibl.title: Coptic Studies on the Threshold of a New Millennium I – Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Coptic Studies Leiden, 27 August- 2 September 2000. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 133)

bibl.seg: WORP Klaas A., Notes on Coptic Containers of Liquids in Greek Papyri.

Mat IMMERZEEL and Jacques VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), with the assistance of Maarten KERSTEN and Carolien VAN ZOEST, Coptic Studies on the Treshold of a New Millennium. Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Coptic Studies. Leiden, 27 August - 2 September 2000. I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 133 (Leuven, 2004) pp. 553-572.

I. Jar names starting with the letters λακ- or λαγ-. - II. Collection of other Semitic terms for containers of liquids occurring in Greek papyri from Egypt: βανωτός / βανώτιον, βαύκαλις and βαυκάλιον, βῖκος and βικίον, ἵνιον, κάβος / καβίδιον, κόεις, κόντσου, σιρώτ(ης) / σιρωτόν / συρωτόν, τιλμεει, χαλμαια, ψινθ( ).
